真正面: (ましょうめん) - directly opposite; right in front
真水: (まみず) - fresh water; fiscal spending/government pump priming
真海豚: (マイルカ) - short-beaked common dolphin (Delphinus delphis)
真清水: (ましみず) - pure water; clear water
真澄の空: (ますみのそら) - perfectly clear and serene sky
真澄の鏡: (ますみのかがみ) - perfectly clear mirror
真澄鏡: (まそみかがみ) - perfectly clear mirror
真烏賊: (まいか) - Japanese common squid/Pacific flying squid (Todarodes pacificus); golden cuttlefish (Sepia esculenta); Japanese spineless cuttlefish (Sepiella japonica)
真犯人: (しんはんにん) - the real criminal; true culprit
真猿: (まさる) - monkey (esp. the Japanese macaque, Macaca fuscata)
真猿亜目: (しんえんあもく) - Simiiformes (infraorder comprising the simians, i.e. higher primates)
真獣下綱: (しんじゅうかこう) - Eutheria (mammalian infraclass)
真珠取り: (しんじゅとり) - pearl fishing; pearl diver
真珠婚式: (しんじゅこんしき) - pearl wedding (anniversary)
真珠湾攻撃: (しんじゅわんこうげき) - Attack on Pearl Harbor (Dec. 7, 1941)
真珠腫: (しんじゅしゅ) - cholesteatoma; pearl tumor; pearl tumour
真珠色: (しんじゅいろ) - pearl gray; pearl grey
真珠貝: (しんじゅがい) - pearl oyster (esp. Marten's pearl oyster, Pinctada fucata martensii)
真珠養殖: (しんじゅようしょく) - pearl culture
真珠養殖場: (しんじゅようしょくじょう) - pearl-oyster beds
真症: (しんしょう) - genuine case (of a disease)
真白: (ましろ) - pure white; blank (e.g. mind, paper)
真皮: (しんぴ) - true (inner) skin; corium; derma; cutis
真盛り: (まさかり) - height of; middle of; full bloom
真盤竜亜目: (しんはんりゅうあもく) - Eupelycosauria (suborder of pelycosaurs)
真相究明: (しんそうきゅうめい) - (yoji) probe into the truth (of the matter); dig into the real facts of the case; get at the root of a matter
真相究明委員会: (しんそうきゅうめいいいんかい) - fact-finding committee
真砂和え: (まさごあえ) - dish dressed with fish roe
真祖: (しんそ) - true ancestor; var. of vampire (in fiction)
真秀呂場: (まほろば) - great and splendid land (of Yamato); spiritual center of the land/one's spiritual home; excellent location/splendid place
真秀等: (まほら) - great and splendid land (Yamato word); excellent location; splendid place
真秀等間: (まほらま) - great and splendid land (Yamato word); excellent location; splendid place
真穴子: (まあなご) - common Japanese conger eel (Conger myriaster)
真空包装: (しんくうほうそう) - vacuum packaging
真空容器: (しんくうようき) - vacuum vessel; vacuum chamber
真空掃除機: (しんくうそうじき) - vacuum cleaner
真空蒸着: (しんくうじょうちゃく) - vacuum deposition
真空蛍光管: (しんくうけいこうかん) - vacuum fluorescent tube
真空調理: (しんくうちょうり) - vacuum cooking; sous vide
真空電球: (しんくうでんきゅう) - vacuum bulb
真竹: (マダケ) - Japanese timber bamboo (Phyllostachys bambsoides); giant timber bamboo; madake
真筆: (しんぴつ) - autograph; one's own handwriting; personal note
真経津の鏡: (まふつのかがみ) - mirror; Mafutsu no Kagami (alternate name for Yata no Kagami, the mirror of the Imperial regalia)
真綿で首を絞める: (まわたでくびをしめる) - to drag things out; to creep up slowly on the point; to strangle (execute) slowly with a silk cord (instead of quickly with a rope)
真羽太: (マハタ) - sevenband grouper (species of fish, Epinephelus septemfasciatus); convict grouper
真花: (しんか) - {bot} fertile flower (on a flowering plant which also has infertile flowers, e.g. hydrangeas)
真苧: (カラムシ) - ramie (Boehmeria nivea var. nipononivea)
真菌毒: (しんきんどく) - mycotoxin; fungal toxin
真菌症: (しんきんしょう) - cryptosporidiosis; mycosis; mycoses
真蜆: (マシジミ) - Corbicula leana (species of basket clam)
